name: Skins Pro Creator
description:
Fully compatible with Minecraft Pocket Edition and Java Edition!

The most popular Minecraft editing platform is all new! Version 7.0 is rebuilt from the ground up featuring a modern and intuitive interface. Take advantage of the latest technologies such as:

- Instant Apply (new!)
-- Connect your Java Edition account and apply your skins instantly, without having to repeatedly sign in.

- AR Character Previews (new!)
-- See your character in real life! Place it on any surface and walk around the character on supported devices.

- Siri Shortcuts (new!)
-- Set up your own custom shortcuts to claim rewards and more!

- iPad Drag & Drop (new!)
-- Drag skin files to other apps or import skins saved from your other apps.

- 3D Touch (new!)
-- Press to draw thicker lines in our editor.

----------------

The new Skins Pro Creator improves the classic editing system with more editing features than any other competitor, including:

- Smart Colors (new!)
- Simple body selection (new!)
- Copy and Paste
- Color Dropper
- Editing Grid
- Eraser
- Multiple brush sizes (3D Touch enhanced)
- Offline editing
- Undo button to quickly reverse an error
- Color filters like grayscale, sepia and more
- Add heavy or light noise filters
- Bulk Editor to add filters to your entire skin at once

Search hundreds of thousands of skins in our database, or upload your own! With our new upload system featuring new Games Pro Network accounts, you'll get upload notifications and even see skins created by other users.

With a Games Pro Network account, you can claim daily coin rewards, collect bonuses, and compete with others to collect the most!

Additional features include:

- Minecraft Java and Pocket Edition Compatible
- New Advanced Skin format featuring pants, jackets and sleeves
- Over 500,000 searchable user created templates
- Upload your skins using a Games Pro Network account
- Load a Java Edition user's skin and modify it for your own!
- Save and import skins from your photo's library
- Change your Java Edition skin right inside the app using Instant Apply or manually
- Automatically save skins for Pocket Edition and launch Minecraft PE
- Universal design support iPad, iPhone and iPod touch

#1 Ranked Utilities App in over 20 Countries (iPad)
#1 Ranked Utilities App in over 12 Countries (iPhone)

No other platform compares to Skins Pro Creator for Minecraft. Download the only professional quality Minecraft skin editing platform available today!

Have questions or feedback about this app? Email us at apps@seejaykay.com. We would love to hear ideas on how to make Skins Pro Creator for Minecraft even better.

Seejaykay apps and websites are family friendly.
